Date.prototype.Format = function (fmt) {
  var o= {
    "M+": this.getMonth() + 1, //æœˆä»½ 
    "d+": this.getDate(), //æ—¥ 
    "H+": this.getHours(), //å°æ—¶ 
    "m+": this.getMinutes(), //åˆ† 
    "s+": this.getSeconds(), //ç§’ 
    "q+": Math.floor((this.getMonth() + 3) / 3), //å­£åº¦ 
    "S": this.getMilliseconds() //æ¯«ç§’ 
  };
  if (/(y+)/.test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (this.getFullYear() + "").substr(4 - RegExp.$1.length));
  for (var k in o)
  if (new RegExp("(" + k + ")").test(fmt)) fmt = fmt.replace(RegExp.$1, (RegExp.$1.length == 1) ? (o[k]) : (("00" + o[k]).substr(("" + o[k]).length)));
  return fmt;
}
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));

pages = parseInt(total / limit) + 1;

  url = getUrl(baseUrl.match(/(comics\/.*\/eps\?page=)/)[1] + i, "get", "");
  list = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.eps.docs;

    link = getUrl(baseUrl.match(/(comics\/.*)\/eps\?page=/)[1] +"/order/" +`${order}` +"/pages?page=1","get","");
    chapters[index] = {
      title: index == total - 1 ? list[j].title+`ã€”${date}ã€•` : list[j].title,
      link: link
    };
  }
}
JSON.stringify(chapters);

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = JSON.parse(result).result.list,
  data = [];
for (i in list) {
  date = list[i].update_time.replace(/\s.*/, "");
  title = list[i].title
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 
      ? `${title}ã€”${date}ã€•` : title,
    link: list[i].imagelist,
    is_Vip: list[i].isvip == "1" ? "true" : "false",
    is_Pay: list[i].isvip == "1" ? "true" : "false",
        time: list[i].update_time
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

}

}

}

kind = [
  "å…¨éƒ¨", "å·¨ä¹³", "å‰§æƒ…", "æµªæ¼«", "æˆå‰§", "æ­£å¦¹", "çˆ±æƒ…",
  "éƒ½å¸‚", "åŒå±…", "å¤šäºº", "", "è¯±æƒ‘", "å¤§å°ºåº¦", ""];
for (j in kind) {
  url =

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var data = [];
list = java.getElements(".weui-cells a");
list == "" ? list =java.getElements("#chapterlist li a") : list;
t1 = String(java.getElements(".placeholder.f-red").text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°æ—¶é—´ï¼š|\s.*/g, "");
t2 = String(java.getElements(".update-time").text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°/, "");
t3 = String(java.getElements(".pt-info.3").text()).replace(/æ›´æ–°ï¼š|\s.*/g, "");
date = String(t1+t2+t3)
for (i in list) {
  pages = String(list[i].text()).match(/\s(\d+)\s/)[1];
  title = baseUrl.match("toptoonmh") || baseUrl.match("tuhaomh")
    ? list[i].select("a").text()
    : list[i].select(".weui-cell__bd p").text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/\så…±.*?å›¾/, "")
      .replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1
      ? `${title} (${pages}P)ã€”${date}ã€•` : `${title} (${pages}P)`,
    link: "bid=" + baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\.html/)[1] +
      "&cid=" + String(list[i].attr("href")).match(/(\d+)/)[1] +
      "&pages=" + pages,
    is_Vip: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false",
    is_Pay: String(list[i]).match(/icon/) ? "true" : "false"
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var list = java.getElements(".chapterlist li"),
  data = [];
date = String(java.getElements(".time").text()).replace(/\s..:../, "");
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].select("span").text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/\så…±.*?å›¾/, "")
      .replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}ã€”${date}ã€•` : title,
    link: list[i].select("a").attr("href")
  });
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
eval(String(source.bookSourceComment));
var data = [];
list = !!baseUrl.match("xfmhua")
  ? java.getElements(".list-item a")
  : java.getElements(".stab_list li a")
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
date = !!baseUrl.match(/xfmhua/)
  ? String(J.select(".sp")[0].textNodes()).match(/\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}/)
  : String(java.getElements(".info dl dd.3").text()).replace(/\s.*/, "");
for (i in list) {
  title = list[i].text();
  order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
  title = settle == "true"
    ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, " ")
      .replace(/\s-\s|-/g, " ").replace(/\s+/, " ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ](|\s)ç¬¬.*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ][^\s]/, "$1 ")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬(\d+)[è¯è©±ç« ]\s\d+/, "$1")
      .replace(/.*ç¬¬.*(\d+).*?[è¯è©±ç« ]/, "$1")
      .replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : "$1")
    : title;
  data.push({
    title: i == list.length - 1 ? `${title}ã€”${date}ã€•` : title,
    link: list[i].attr("href")
  })
}
JSON.stringify(data);
</js>
